entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Gatineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:23 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gatineau Airport 12:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 97.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 1.3°C
Wind: E 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index:

entry.title: Friday: Snow or rain. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow and local blowing snow this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:09 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:09 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:09 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
